entry.title: 2017 - 2018 First Lego League District Results for Steve
entry.summary: Steve 2017 - 2018 First Lego League District Results at Wright State University
entry.content:
Here are the results from the Springboro Robotics team Steve from the 2017 - 2018 First Lego League Districts at Wright State University. Unfortunately our team did not qualify for the state tournament, all the kids had fun this year (most important) and we had great success this year.

  • The team earned a maximum of 90 points on the robot game

entry.title: 2017 - 2018 First Lego League Regional Results for Steve
entry.summary: Steve 2017 - 2018 First Lego League Regional Results at Emmerson
entry.content:
Here are the results from the Springboro Robotics team Steve from the 2017 - 2018 First Lego League Regional at Emmersion School. Fortunately our team did qualify for the district tournament, all the kids had fun this year (most important) and we had great success this year.

  • The team earned 7th place on the robot game and earned a total of 30 points

entry.title: 2015 - 2016 First Lego League District Results for The Lego Creepers
entry.summary: Lego Creepers 2015 - 2016 First Lego League District Results at
entry.content:
Sinclair Community College.

Here are the results from the Springboro Robotics rookie team Lego Creepers from the 2015 - 2016 First Lego League Districts tournament at Sinclair Community College. Unfortunately our team didn't qualify for the state tournament but all the kids had fun this year (most important) and we had great success this year by qualifying for districts as a a rookie team.

entry.title: Eli Created a Lego Raspberry PI Case for New Raspberry PI 2
entry.summary: Eli created a inexpensive case for the raspberry PI 2 from Lego
entry.content: Save some money, build your Raspberry Pi case out of Legos. Even better have your kid build the case for you.
